main: ^<sp:50>I don't think there's anything more for us to discuss.
^<sp:50>You can sit by the fire, if you want.
^<sp:50>But don't expect any chatter from me.

c-1: ^<sp:50>...you don't have many of these <anim:wave>conversations</anim>, do you?
g-0: ^<sp:50>Stay, leave, it's up to you. But it's either the temple or the road.
